breadCrumbs.text: Choose how to find a supplier

title: Choose how to find a supplier

form.question: Select how you want to buy from a supplier on this agreement.

hint.text: Shortlist the suppliers to find the ones most suitable for your procurement using a capability assessment tool. You can then choose to continue your further competition online or upload documents to create your bid pack. Only the suppliers you shortlist using the capability assessment will be invited to bid for your opportunity.

Shortlist the suppliers to find the ones most suitable for your procurement using a capability assessment tool.You can then choose to continue your direct award online or use your own organisation's procurement systems.
If you select this option, you will need to invite all suppliers to bid for your opportunity and assess all bids that are submitted.
